title: Medicine Ball Catch and Overhead Throw

items: Stand facing a partner with a medicine ball in your hands.
Step forward with one foot and bring the ball back behind your head.
As you step forward with your other foot, throw the ball overhead to your partner.
Your partner will catch the ball and repeat the exercise back to you.
Continue throwing the ball back and forth for a set amount of time or repetitions.
Make sure to use your entire body to generate power for the throw and catch the ball with both hands.
As you become more comfortable with the exercise, you can increase the weight of the medicine ball or the distance between you and your partner.
Increases power and explosiveness in upper body muscles
Can be used for cardiovascular conditioning
Can be done alone or with a partner for added challenge and fun
Leg muscles (if performed with a squat or lunge)
